file_insights.bin/olimpus.ts: Complete CLI implementation with validate command, error handling, help systems, and proper exit codes. Uses JSONC parser with trailing comma support, integrates with existing validator schema and utilities.
file_insights..auto-claude/specs/003-configuration-val: Updated to mark subtask-3-1 as completed and reflect current project status
file_insights..auto-claude-status: Updated status tracking showing completion progress from 9/16 to 11/16 subtasks, phase change from 'Validator Tests' to 'CLI Integration'
file_insights..auto-claude/specs/003-configuration-val: Added entries for subtask-2-5 and subtask-3-1 with successful completion records
Added commit hashes for completed subtasks with proper timestamping
file_insights.olimpus.jsonc: Configuration file for CLI validation testing

patterns_discovered.CLI Architecture: Command-based structure with central main() function, command registry pattern, and consistent error handling
patterns_discovered.JSONC Processing: Proper JSONC parsing with error reporting including line numbers and offset information
patterns_discovered.Integration Pattern: Seamless integration with existing validation schema, error formatting, and utility functions
patterns_discovered.Exit Code Management: Proper exit codes (0 for success, 1 for failure) for both validation errors and CLI usage errors
patterns_discovered.Session Management: Auto-Claude maintains session-based development with progressive subtask completion
patterns_discovered.Commit Pattern: Each subtask completion results in a dedicated commit with descriptive messages

gotchas_discovered.JSONC Error Reporting: Detailed error messages with line numbers and offsets for better debugging
gotchas_discovered.File Path Resolution: Absolute path resolution for validation context while maintaining relative path display
gotchas_discovered.Error Type Handling: Specific Error instance checking vs generic error handling
gotchas_discovered.Bun Shebang: Proper shebang for Bun runtime execution
gotchas_discovered.Progressive Completion: Subtasks must be completed sequentially as they depend on previous phase completions

key_achievements: Created fully functional CLI entry point with validate command
Integrated existing validation system with user-friendly CLI interface
Implemented comprehensive help systems and documentation
Added proper error handling and exit code management
approach_outcome.technical_quality: High - follows CLI best practices, integrates cleanly with existing codebase, includes thorough error handling and user guidance
approach_outcome.progress_achieved: Moved from 9/16 to 11/16 completed subtasks, with phase transition from 'Validator Tests' to 'CLI Integration'

recommendations: Consider adding global configuration file support for default settings
Implement output formatting options (JSON, YAML, etc.) for machine-readable output
Add --verbose flag for detailed validation information
Consider adding watch mode for continuous validation during development
Implement config auto-completion support for better developer experience
